content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15, -50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-13.5, -49.5), (-18.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-9.5, -49.5)
- Stone furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Storage and Processing at Position (47.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)
- Stone furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Inserter Operations
- Ensure that inserters have sufficient fuel to operate. Refuel inserters regularly to avoid stoppages.

### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining and production stoppages. Specifically, empty the chest at (-14.5, -48.5) and (41.5, -80.5) to continue mining operations.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Ensure all furnaces and mining drills are adequately refueled to maintain continuous operation.
